description:
The Tsukino Empire movie depicting an alternate reality on a large scale was an important work that helped Procella member Iku Kannazuki grow. "I`m hungry..."
Woken by an empty stomach in the middle of the night, Iku spots the Tsukino Empire movie in the living room. He reminisces about the past while watching the movie and reaches for some instant noodles.
You Hazuki also shows up with an empty stomach, as well as skilled cook Yoru Nagatsuki... This episode is loaded with simple recipes you`ll want to try cooking yourself!
Enjoy the charm of handsome boys in their military uniforms and hungry boys outside of work. "This is turning into a food porn episode..."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mukashi to Ima to Yashoku to Mirai to
The Past, the Present, the Midnight Meal, and the Future
昔と今と夜食と未来と
